Plot: The heroic Spartan king Leonidas, armed with nothing but leather underwear and a cape, leads a ragtag bunch of 13 Spartan misfit warriors to defend their homeland against thousands of ...
Title: Meet the Spartans
Actors: Sean Maguire, Carmen Electra, Ken Davitian, Kevin Sorbo
tomatoConsensus: A tired, unfunny, offensive waste of time, Meet the Spartans scrapes the bottom of the cinematic barrel.
